overview: Un Levanton is about a man who takes over a drug cartel, while fatally overwhelmed to greed. Who now pretends to be his boss as Mr. Guzman and his partners to the world as Drug Lords. In revenge Mr. Guzman sends a large size platoon, as a hit squad to Cesar Villarreal's territory to kill him for his misadventure. Everything comes crumbling down when the world will now know Mr. Guzman as "Un Levanton".
title: Un Levanton
